subject: FULL PLAN - Communications Architecture
content:
Chad - Here's the complete plan Caleb and I developed:

## ARCHITECTURE
```
CALEB (Commander)
    ↓ Telegram
CHAD_YI (Brain/Delegator)
    ↓ GitHub
HELIOS (Spine/Router)
    ↓ Redis/HTTP/GitHub
AGENTS (20 total)
    ↓
DASHBOARD (Real-time)
```

## COMMUNICATION LAYERS
1. CRITICAL (<1s): Redis pub/sub (Helios ↔ Agents)
2. COORDINATION (30s): GitHub files (Helios ↔ Chad)
3. ASYNC: GitHub commits (complex discussions)

## PHASES
Phase 1: Infrastructure (Helios leads)
- Docker Compose setup
- Redis message bus
- HTTP API
- Auto-sync (DONE ✓)

Phase 2: Spawn First 3 Agents (Together)
- Escritor (writer)
- Quanta (trading)
- Autour (content)

Phase 3: Coordination Protocol (Joint)
- Task assignment
- Status reporting
- Dashboard updates

## FILES
Full plans in repo:
- COMMUNICATIONS_ARCHITECTURE_PLAN.md
- COLLABORATIVE_BUILD_PLAN.md
- FULLY_AUTOMATED_ARCHITECTURE.md
